transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller to the specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another, on behalf of the token owner.

approve.description: Approves a spender to withdraw a certain amount from the caller's account.

approveAndCall.description: Approves a spender and calls a function on the spender.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a specific address.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

creationBlock.description: Returns the block number when the token was created.

version.description: Returns the version of the contract.

changeController.description: Changes the controller of the token.

createCloneToken.description: Creates a clone token with specified parameters.

generateTokens.description: Generates new tokens for a specified address.

destroyTokens.description: Destroys tokens from a specified address.

claimTokens.description: Claims tokens from the specified token contract.

parentToken.description: Returns the address of the parent token.

parentSnapShotBlock.description: Returns the block number of the parent snapshot.

balanceOfAt.description: Returns the balance of a specific address at a specific block number.

totalSupplyAt.description: Returns the total supply at a specific block number.

tokenFactory.description: Returns the address of the token factory.

controller.description: Returns the address of the current controller.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given parameters.

NewCloneToken.description: Emitted when a new clone token is created.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made.
